properties.address: Colwell Baptist Church, Isle of Wight PO40 9NB
properties.description: On a Tuesday afternoon, we open our church hall as a warm space for all...we also offer free tea/coffee.
properties.title: Colwell Community Cafe

properties.description: Community Meal - every Wednesday at 5.30pm families and individuals of all ages and stages warmly welcomed Enjoy community and friendship over a hot homecooked meal and dessert. Please book space with Sarah on 07536 983678 so we know numbers (we are happy to cater for your dietary needs)
properties.title: Community Meal at The Runway

properties.description: The Bridge is open from 10am-4pm Monday to Friday A computer is available to access the internet Books/activities/tv/music
properties.title: The Bridge

properties.address: West Wight Sports & Community Centre, Isle of Wight PO40 9XH
properties.description: Visit our warm, welcome café area anytime we are open. We also run the free Our Place community café weekly on Tuesdays between 10:30 and 12:30 should you need any help and advice on a variety of issues.
properties.title: West Wight Sports and Community Centre

properties.address: Colwell Road, Freshwater, PO40 9GG Open all year round
properties.description: Tuesday 11am to 2pm. A nice warm space, advice, company, soup and a roll and hot drinks.
properties.title: Green Meadows

properties.address: Christ Church, Alum Bay New Road, Totland Bay, PO39 0ESOpen all year round
properties.description: One-to-one digital support available on the first Monday of the month. Website: Our Place - West Wight Sports and Community Centre

hours._text: Monday 2pm to 3pm. Closed bank holidays. Community drop-in café for anyone and everyone. Free refreshments (donations happily accepted!), support and advice available.

properties.title: Our Place Community Café Totland

properties.address: 12 Victoria Road, Freshwater, Isle of Wight, PO40 9HZ
properties.description: The West Wight Community Market including: tea, coffee and cakes every week, soup once a month, food from supermarkets on a pay as you feel basis from 2pm by The Real Junk Food Project IW, a craft table, drop and swap table, coffee and chat table and eco refill scheme.

hours._text: Friday 1pm to 3pm apart from some holidays.

properties.title: Freshwater Parish Hall

properties.address: Freshwater Methodist Church, Brookside Road, Freshwater PO40 9ER
properties.description: Mondays 10am to 12pm except for bank holidays. Enjoy a meal on the first Monday of the month. Warm drinks, biscuits, knitting/craft group, scrabble and other board games, jigsaw table, friendly atmosphere.
properties.title: Oasis Drop In Centre
